bootloader.title: Reboot to Recovery
bootloader.description: With the device powered off, press and hold the volume up, Bixby and power buttons until the screen turns on. It should boot to recovery, from recovery boot to 'fastboot' mode

downgrade_android.title: Downgrade Android
downgrade_android.description: Device has to be downgraded to latest stock Android 10 before installation

install_recovery.title: Install the recovery image
install_recovery.description: Install the recovery image from https://tinyurl.com/starqlte-recovery from download mode

cutie_notice.title: Cutie Shell: Notice
cutie_notice.description: You selected to install Droidian with Cutie Shell. Cutie Shell is still pre-alpha quality and it is not suitable for production environments. Keep in mind that Cutie Shell is not officially supported or endorsed by Droidian. This edition is maintained directly by Cutie Shell Community Project and you should report any bugs with these images at Cutie Shell Community Project before filing upstream.
